              Responsibilities:
              
              - Develop and maintain relationship with new and existing customers and partners

Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Diploma and above in Business/Electronic/Engineering or technology related discipline
              
              - 3-6 years’ experience in CCTV, security system, data analyzing (both products and services) or related field
              
              - Possess foresight vision to identify potential problems that might be encountered, and providing quick devised solutions
              
              - Independent, Self-driven with a ‘can do’ attitude
              
              - Able to communicate in Vietnamese and English both verbal and written
              
              - Good Analytical, Negotiation and Communication skills
              
              - Good attitude, integrity and interpersonal skill
